website_summaries.verdict: Older kids can join in the fun, too, with this stylish pair from a trusted brand. Tweens can charge their shoes repeatedly; but toddler sizes lack a port.
pros: Comes in sizes for both young kids and tweens, although only the larger sizes are rechargeable
Variety of color and light pattern options in larger shoes
Very comfortable and look stylish even when not lit
cons: Some reports that one shoe in pair stops lighting

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's 5th birthday as he has been begging for them for months. He has only worn them a handful of times in the month that we've had them. One of the shoes will no longer charge or light up. We've tried switching USB in hopes of getting it to charge, but no luck. HUGE disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Neat Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Really neat! Not like the small children's' light up shoes. These have different speeds for the lights. They can be charged by attaching the charger to a place in the tongue of the shoe. The lights change colors and are very vivid. My grandson is 8 and he does not want to take them off. We got the white shoe, and they are very adult looking. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doty

customer_reviews.title: These Kids Shoes are Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Original order through Amazon-when the shoes were late arriving I received an email from the source explaining that sadly their entire shipment had been stolen-certainly no ones fault but I'm writing anyway to let you know we eventually did get these Sketcher Light Up Shoes...my 7 year old grandson loves them so much he begged his parents to let him sleep in them!!! They are really very awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love'em. I buy sketchers all of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love'em. I buy sketchers all of the time these were a little more pricey compared to the other light up shoes but I guess its the "in" thing now. I wish the battery lasted a little longer by the time they're done with school the lights need to be charged up again.
customer_reviews.author: Keya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were awesome and perfect for his costume. And now he can wear them whenever he wants. The lights stayed on for a pretty good amount of time. I'm guessing it was over three hours and he never shut them off and they were still going when we got home. Plus they have quite a few options for you to pick whether you want one color or all the colors flashing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No zipper - misleading pictures
customer_reviews.text: The pictures show a zipper in the back of the shoe, but the ones I received are not zip up. I probably would not have purchased these if I had known they wouldn’t be zip up since my kids aren’t able to tie their shoes yes.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson for his birthday he loved them and so did everyone else there. The size is a true fit,very comfortable and look great with or with out the lights on. I love them and highly recommended purchasing them, I want a pair myself. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha A.

customer_reviews.title: Compliments
customer_reviews.text: My son used these for a Marshmello Halloween costume. He got stopped so many times for how cool they looked. He ended up using them after Halloween on non gym days at school for fun. The battery charges fast and it lasts an appropriate 8 hours or so. I also thought the price was fair for the led lights and shoe combined - it was still priced less than just a normal white tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bosquez

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: They look good, fit well, but the lights only lasted about 2 weeks for my son. He is very careful with his shoes, keeps them clean and uses them gently. He really didn't use the lights except for showing off to his friends for a minute, then would turn them right back off. One day one of the shoes started flashing red on its own and wouldn't turn off until the battery was dead, and now that shoe won't charge. He said he didn't mind since they look good without the light aspect, but I'm a little ticked off they didn't even last a month.
customer_reviews.author: C..holland

customer_reviews.title: Decent when you get a legit pair, beware of knock offs
customer_reviews.text: First pair I ordered was clearly a knock off. They came in a bag, only 1 shoe worked. Amazon returns are still a little bit of a hassle but they did sent a replacement 2 days later. The second pair came in an actual sketchers box. The fact that counterfeits are still slipping into the supply chain this day and technological age is bull. Anyway decent shoes, more for show than wear.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIAM

customer_reviews.title: Wish the charge for lights lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to have a pair of these fancy light up shoes. Have held up well and are good quality. My only issue with these shoes is we've had a problem with the lights. We can fully charge them and they'll only be good for up to 2 days of use. And no, my son does not leave the shoes on all day, I'd say the light are on maybe 1 full hour then they won't come on until recharged. I feel the lights should run longer than that. Not sure if we got a dud or if all the shoes are like this. They were working up well up to the 30day return
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new kicks. She's been begging me to get them for a while. At first I was hesitant, because I thought they'd be bulky, and goofy looking on her feet but I was wrong. They're actually very cute on her. The batteries operated correctly. Great colors! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not too big she trips but not a perfect fit to out grow and three months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger so my daughter could wear them a while and they are exactly a half size larger. Not too big she trips but not a perfect fit to out grow and three months. She loves the color options and the lights are nice and bright even in daylight. I have bought sketchers for my self in the past and love the quality and comfort and these look to be the same. Need to update I am disappointed that half of the lights went out in one shoe after only 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about the shoes. The person I bought them for flipped in happiness after they knew they fit. The material does seem a little stiff, but I'm sure that will be okay after being worn. Also, they said the support was also better than they thought. For being shoes that are more about display than comfort, they still fit the comfort bill rather well. For now, I have a very happy show wearer.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We would have given these 5 stars. Nice bright light, lots of different light options. My son loved them. However, after less than 3 months the left shoe will no longer charge. My son is so disappointed. He never wore them for playing outside & took great care of them especially for an 11 year old boy. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: djbarker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cool. The lights are amazing and bright. My son (7 yrs old)wanted them so bad so I finally got them for him. I let him wear them to school on the first day and he was over the moon happy. With that said, these shoes are not meant for playing on the playground. They came back all beat up and filthy. Some of the white plastic was already coming off the bottom. So they are great for older kids who will not be running around on gravel and dirt. I have cleaned them and put them up for the next special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Treemg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes! 8 yr old son LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great, came in Sketchers box. Went ahead and charged them for 2 hours and they work perfectly! My son LOVES them, nice style of shoe even without the lights on. I pray the lights work for a long period of time (Iv read some reviews) if anything changes I’ll be updating my review.
customer_reviews.author: AnaMaria Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Just Stopped Working One Morning
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before purchasing. However, my son begged and begged for these shoes leading up to Christmas. His friends at school had them, so of course he had to have them too. He was so excited when he opened them on Christmas and the week he wore them after. Then one fateful day, one of the shoes just stopped lighting up. Well, the front half of it stopped lighting up. But either way, it’s pretty much useless. He can’t be walking around with 1 1/2 shoes lit. Long story short, I would avoid these or at least read the negative reviews from parents who have had these for longer than 10 minutes after unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: The light effects are really cool. There are patterns and solid colors
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nephew, for his birthday, and they were a big hit. The light effects are really cool. There are patterns and solid colors, that can be chosen, by pushing a button on the tongue. When the lights aren't on they still look like fashionable high tops. They are really attractive shoes, and I like that they are Skechers, because that is a brand that I know is high quality. Don't hesitate to get these, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted these so bad after seeing the commercials. He was so excited to get them for Christmas! He would wear them everyday if I let him. He always has kids come up and ask where he got them.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I paid quite a bit for these shoes March 1st it is now April 8th and one shoe hasn’t worked for a few days now. Gently worn and usually only inside for gym and in his classroom. The deadline to return was March 31st. I am very unhappy and angry I cannot return them! A little more than a month old and already malfunctioning. Ridiculous. They have been fully charged too!
customer_reviews.author: tanya cusson

customer_reviews.title: One shoe did not work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing all around. The sneakers we received were a different style than what was pictured when I ordered. A high top pleather as opposed to a low top fabric style. The size appeared to run small. The biggest issue was that one sneaker did not work. They flash red as they are charging. The charging cord has a split end so both are plugged in at the same time. One began flashing and charged with no problem. The other did nothing. I tried switching the plug but the shoe itself was the problem. So, only one working shoe, wrong style and too tight...I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.text: bought these for myb 10 yr old daughter.She loves them and all of her friends think that they are so cool. I wanted to gv a great review, however after just 2 1/2 months, one of the shoes does not light up and seems to be charging. In short, given the opportunity, I would not purchase hese shoes again, I gave it 2 stars because despite the fact that one will not light up anymore, the shoe is still a good looking black hightop Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: esierra

customer_reviews.title: I have amazon prime so the exchange was quick and easy. The replacement pair arrived a few days later ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as comfort idk these are for my 5 year old son. I bought them for his Christmas present I am currently customizing them in blue camo. So he hasn’t had a chance to wear them for an extended period, just for a moment to make sure they’d fit. First pair the left shoe would not turn on or charge, I have amazon prime so the exchange was quick and easy. The replacement pair arrived a few days later and both work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Momx3Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: Such fun shoes! They are great quality! There are many different options for the lights. Definitely a cool pair of shoes. My son and his friends all have some (their's are a different brand, my son is on the far right.) They love to ride their scooters around the neighborhood with their LED shoes. These are easy to charge, and hold the charge for a very long time. They are also simple to operate and change colors. A good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Yrk

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves these shoes but as a parent I think they are a pain in the butt to maintain if your kid is too young or not responsible enough to remember to charge them every night. I've noticed that one shoe does not charge as well as the other so the battery does run out faster. I'm not sure if it is a defect of the shoe, the dual charging cord, or the type of plug I'm using for the provided charging cord.
customer_reviews.author: OkieNurse

customer_reviews.title: Fun sneaker for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes my son loves them and the attention he gets from wearing them, **** UPDATE: my only complaint and its too late to send them back is one shoe stopped working and we can figure out why...this is his second pair same thing
customer_reviews.author: Vernett

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it too....not just boys shoe
customer_reviews.text: One - The shoe was sold as Kids (Kids) no mention Boy ?? Two - The shoe received did not have the zipper (as shown) in the back. Overall however, my 9 year old daughter simply loves the shoe, and I too am very pleased.....does not look like a boys shoe :). The only trouble spot is that the button to work colors and lights is rather hard to find and press...which is the reason for only 4 stars. Everything else would be given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Albright

customer_reviews.title: These are neat but I wish they worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with the charger! Also I bought a pair for my 6yr old and one for my 2 yrs old... the ones I got for my 6yr old don’t light up when he walks! And the ones for my 2 year old don’t charge
customer_reviews.author: Lady_in_Red86

customer_reviews.title: Loved these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ABSOLUTELY LOVED these shoes. They were so cute on and were so fun to wear. Unfortunately, after we charged them, one of the shoes wouldn’t light up after they were initially turned on. We tried several times, but would always have to go back and hook it up to the charger to get it to come on.... we returned them but will totally be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTS STOPPED WORKING AFTER ONLY A WEEK
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good quality and fit true to size. But, one of the shoes stopped lighting up after only ONE WEEK of wear. This has happened before with another brand (similar style). We thought by buying a brand we know and usually love, Skechers, that we would get a quality product. Unfortunately, this is not the case. Don't waste the money.
customer_reviews.author: love2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy - breaks in days
customer_reviews.text: Received on a Tuesday and left foot had stopped working by Friday. Won't charge, won't light up. Is going to be returned for a refund. I read reviews like the one I just typed up but decided to get them anyway. I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: NotARobot

customer_reviews.title: Fit adults too
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself after comparing the size charts. I wanted a fun light up shoe that I could party in but was still discreet when not lit. These are a mature solid black. They’re still the same comfort and quality that I know and love from Skechers. Honestly a lot of adult light up shoes are from knockoff brands I’ve ever heard of. If your feet are on the smaller side, give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Yam Yam

customer_reviews.title: My sister bought this for my son's birthday he only ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought this for my son's birthday he only wore them a few times and they won't turn on anymore at first I thought it was the charger so I bought a new charger and still won't turn on anymore he only had them for 2 months not the sellers fault I guess
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these for his 8th birthday and he loves them. They charge fast and stay charged for a long time. The shoes look really cool when they're lit up and it has so many different color options. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Montclair

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe stopped working/charging/won’t light up. They were hardly worn, I mean really. Maybe 5 times, charged them and tried the two different cords on the shoe, still won’t charge. And we cannot return or exchange because the window closed for exchanges and returns.
customer_reviews.author: Chede

customer_reviews.title: it's cool looking but a little too bulky for? the kid!
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these light up shoesat the beginning. but after a while he stopped to wear them? because he said it's too bulky and not so comfortable as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair not charging again
customer_reviews.text: We returned the first pair because one of the shoes stopped charging, and a little over a month later the new set both shoes no longer charging. Poor kids tries to charge them every night with the hope they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Leap of Faith

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved these. They looked great on his feet. He got a lot of compliments when he wore them. I loved the different variations of lights that will compliment his outfit every time. Charging was simple as will. It wasn't difficult to figure out how to adjust the colors even without instructions. My son was devastated when they died and we had to give them a quick charge in the car. I read a lot of reviews where the lights stopped working and I'm hoping that doesn't happen because the lights make the shoe pop.
customer_reviews.author: Detricia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. We did have issues with them rubbing his ankles a bit the first time he wore them, but I figure that is due to them being new and needing to be worn in. So far they charge and work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: April P

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair in our household as my daughters love these shoes. They like to wear them at dusk or night and turn them to run around the cul-de-sac!
customer_reviews.author: tlsdeve

customer_reviews.title: Light Up feature (in one shoe) failed after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good price, fit was comfortable & true to size, charging cable is easy to use/fits correctly into "hidden" ports, nice choice of lighting "options" Cons: it's been less than a month and the left shoe no longer charges/powers on and the shoelaces completely frayed/unraveled. They still function absolutely fine as sneakers, they've just lost the "cool" factor that we bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B - Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: durability not the best
customer_reviews.text: son liked these in the shoe store. available on amazon for better value and more styles to choose from. easy to charge, first pair of lace up shoes. after about a month of wear, half of the lights on one shoe would no longer light up. other reviews said similar so as expected really. fun for a bit, more novelty than anything else. they fell out of fashion quickly. shoe itself has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Light shoes
customer_reviews.text: My kids both got light up shoes and the look on their faces and the fun they have them is priceless. I wish I had something like this when I was a kid. They love them. The last pair I bought him were twice the cost and he wore them out. They were the only shoes he'd wear and still won't throw the old ones out. 💞💞💞👍
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: My daughter liked them...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a novelty. My daughter let me try them on and there is no cushion or arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lights
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was so happy to find these sneakers, the store sketchers no longer sells them
customer_reviews.author: Sarajane

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves them but there are a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these shoes. Has to charge them almost nightly. One shoe seems to hold a charge better than the other. Laces are short for high top shoes and keep coming undone. Not sure how well they will wear, the soles are not made of rubber like most tennis shoes. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: DCO

customer_reviews.title: Work great, battery life good
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these!!! Work great, battery life good, the charge port is placed well so it doesn't dig into the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & misty

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't expect them to be this cool! My grandson can't wait to wear them and ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I really didn't expect them to be this cool! My grandson can't wait to wear them and the changing colors fascinate him. (He's 4) A friend bought a pair for her son, but she bought them at a shoe store and paid over $60. Thanks for the discount!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Received In perfect working condition. My only complaint is that I didn't get the exact one I ordered but nevertheless my son loves it. As you can see in the pics it's a different shoe. The "s" is more 3D and projected rather than blended in the shoe
customer_reviews.author: amy joseph

customer_reviews.title: The lights do not work
customer_reviews.text: The lights worked only for one day and no matter how long we charged the shoes for they just didn’t work. I am especially unhappy because I saw cheaper options but thought to go with a well know brand (Sketchers). I also cannot return the shoes as I live in Lagos - NIGERIA. My son is absolutely crushed because he wanted these shoes very much.
customer_reviews.author: chomsy

customer_reviews.title: My son love the shoes.
customer_reviews.text: We just received the shoes ahead of schedule and my son was truly excited with the new shoes. The shoes fit perfectly and the assorted colors they can change to makes them look magical. He has not taken them off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Yogeek

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Lighting Up Within A Week
customer_reviews.text: One shoe stopped lighting up within a week and the second shoe stopped lighting up within two weeks. As sneakers they are fine but, obviously, they were purchased for the light up feature that does not perform.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: They DO NOT last long!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are super cute. They remind me of Air Force 1 high tops but with lights. HOWEVER, we bought these for our son as a Christmas gift. No more than a month later the lights stopped working. We returned them with no problem for a new pair. It happened again within a few weeks and the sneaker tore! We can’t return them as the window to return them closed quite quickly. A bit disappointing especially for Sketchers!
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Back to back defective shoes
customer_reviews.text: Twice I ordered these shoes and twice I got one shoe that would not charge more than two minites and would not turn on. The first time neither shoe turned on at all. The two boxes were utterly trashed. This was from two different suppliers as the first one could not replace the pair they sent. It looks like all the stock that is left is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: We don’t know yet
customer_reviews.text: We don’t know yet it is a Christmas 🎄 gift 🎁 that our son want upon up until Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Bishop N

customer_reviews.title: Love thoughts lights
customer_reviews.text: I brought these sneakers for my grandson every day the commercial came on tv he kept asking for these sneakers when the package arrived at my home he couldn't wait to open the box and put on the sneakers and to test out all the light on the sneakers he love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very funky
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He has wide feet and these fit perfectly. He wears a 3 we bought 3.5 as I didn’t want him to outgrow them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harding

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved them, we got the size 5.5 would of went with a size 6 but doesn’t come in that size.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina L.

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: One of the pair is not working. Shoeas are ok. Number scale is right but led lights terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ercan

customer_reviews.title: It runs a bit large ( what is perfect ) giving my son some time to grow in ...
customer_reviews.text: It runs a bit large ( what is perfect ) giving my son some time to grow in to it. Great quality, we get stopped several times to be asked where did I get it from. Definitely my son's favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: P A

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted for 5 nights, no better than cheap knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for 5 uses. Quality is no better than the cheaper overseas ones. I thought that with it being from Sketchers, they would be a higher quality. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these for my son. They have been charged but neither show is lighting up!
customer_reviews.author: kbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Kids will live them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them but they dont last ling for an active 7 year old. I had no problems with lights
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lights Out 3 Months Later
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loved these shoes. They are pretty cool...BUT 3 months later and half the lights on one shoe are out. The other shoe has a few lights out. They are still in great condition to wear, but just a heads up that they won't be light up shoes for long.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Chu

customer_reviews.title: One shoe dimmer than the other
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cool, and they fit my son well. The only problem I have with these shoes is that one shoe (the left) is significantly dimmer than the other shoe... no matter how long they charge.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ficht

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Shoes exactly as described and exactly like ones in store. Came with charger and instructions. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Killian

customer_reviews.title: Son loves shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They have a bunch of different color combos and I love that you can recharge them.
customer_reviews.author: D Nice

customer_reviews.title: So amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. The lights are being and the shoes seem to be well made. Easy to charge. I get tons of compliments when I wear them. They’re great at festivals, you can see where you’re stepping.
customer_reviews.author: NikiU

customer_reviews.title: the shoe sucks
customer_reviews.text: this product really disappointed me. I bought them for my stepson right before school started and about a week or so ago 1 shoe quit lighting up and today the other 1 quit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris t.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, My son get so much attention everywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes.... It's been a long time since I bought a pair of Skechers. Great shoe, My son gets so much attention everywhere we go when he wears these.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes but 1 shoe will not light
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes but 1 shoe will not light. When plugged in it have a dim light showing it’s charging but once it’s charged it will not turn on. Online it says sketchers don’t do warranties; things are sold “as is”.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the product I gave them to my grandson for Christmas and one of the shoes will not charge to light up.... but he said that’s ok papaw I want to keep them so I read reviews and seems a lot of people have experienced the same problem maybe they should fix the problem or quit selling them!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Lakin Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these if using the flashing lights they only last 3 hours steady lights last much longer 5 hours atleast
customer_reviews.author: yvonne hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bright and work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and we have had them for a week now and they work great!! He is 4 and wears an 11 and they fit perfectly. They are also very bright lights way worth the money for name brand ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Got the shoes and my child was excited but one shoe would be a weaker color than the other shoe when lights were on. Now less than 6 months and one will not charge or light up. Shoes only light up after charge a few hours if you are lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Shanon

customer_reviews.title: ... are exactly as pictured and the lights are a cool feature. However
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as pictured and the lights are a cool feature. However, keeping them charged is a bit of a hassle for kids and the pair I ordered stopped working within a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Nirvanaaz

customer_reviews.title: Just like the video.
customer_reviews.text: The laces broke quickly, but the shoes themselves are doing fine. My 8-year-old loves these shoes. The colors are just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Fun shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 6 yr old grandson. He loves them. Fit is good and he can turn lights on whenever he chooses. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmast

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes, but hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes, however they are hard for him to get on. You need to loosen them all the way each time to get them on. He is not wearing them that much because of this. Look nice and work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah MP

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: A few of the lights went out almost immediately on the left sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I thought these would be somewhat cheesy, but no, they are actually pretty neat little shoes. The lights show up well even in the daytime! very colorful light, nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Lili H.

customer_reviews.title: Ski Boots
customer_reviews.text: Extremely stiff shoes. Very small too, not true to size due to the stiffness. Shoes do not flex, and they looked like my child was walking in ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: MamaNurseALynch

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew for his birthday. He loved them! They come with a plug so you can charge them. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kasheena Willis

customer_reviews.title: Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of shoes. Durable and fun light up for kids
customer_reviews.author: Darkone43

customer_reviews.title: Great boys sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great boys sneakers fit well cool looking my grandson loves them
customer_reviews.author: jlawn

customer_reviews.title: We received another pa i within 2 days and my son was satisfied only to wear them 2 times to school and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these for the light up features on the bottom. We had to send the first pair back immediately after receiving for not lighting up green on one shoe. We received another pa i within 2 days and my son was satisfied only to wear them 2 times to school and the light up features of green did not work again. My son has not work them since. Waisted money. Frusterated.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Worked great..
customer_reviews.text: Worked great....for about a month and now only half of the lights work. Like many have said, not worth it or the money because it will fail after a month or two. I will be contacting Skechers to see about getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's have been wanting these since the 1st day Skechers advertised them. My girl's LOVED them!!! They arrived quickly and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie Q.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: One shoe stopped working within a few months of purchasing the shoe. They were cool when they were working tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers for my 6 year old son. He really loved them. He is wearing them almost every day. They seem to be very comfortable and fit very well. I still cannot say anything about the durability because it is too early but overall they are perfect for children.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Better the the usual light up shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and my 5yr old was beyond excited about them. They are way cooler than the usual light up shoes. Runs true to size in our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mel L.

customer_reviews.title: look awesome, my son is a hit everywhere he wears ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, look awesome, my son is a hit everywhere he wears these, turned one on red and one on green around christmas time
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great light up shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes, a little heavy but overall great shoes
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Daughters love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to whether the lights will hold up over time because these are new, but my daughters love them. The lights are SO cool!!! Great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If buying for lights don't buy however sneakers are ok
customer_reviews.text: Had to return 1st pair because lights didn't work on one sneaker, received second pair and charger port went bad 45 days later after 30 day return. Worst sneaker investment made
customer_reviews.author: Thondero777

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with this  product will not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Led stopped working within two months. Shoe still look good but the girl don't use them
customer_reviews.author: mauro garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my grandson. They were shipped quickly and my grandson loves them. Very good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Manager in California

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoes! True skechers quality and the lights are ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes! True skechers quality and the lights are very vivid in color. My son has gotten many comments.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes .... my 10 year old loves it .... comes with chargers and has multiple modes
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Hariharan

product_meta.title: Skechers Kids' Energy Lights Sneaker
product_meta.description: Mid top lace up sneaker w/hidden lights
feature_bullets: The sizes Little kid and Big Kid will include the port. Toddler sizes will not have the port.
